description.p: Extract the day number of the year from a date or time value.
Returns the day number of the year from a date or time value.

discussion.p: The DayOfYear function extracts the day number of the year from a date or time value.

example.caption: DayOfYear() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, DayOfYear(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|283
